summary.overview: This JCL job converts text-based card demo statement files into PDF format for enhanced presentation and distribution. The conversion process transforms traditional statement data into modern PDF documents while maintaining data integrity and enabling improved accessibility for business users.
business_functions: Read card demo statement data from input text file
Convert text-based statement format to PDF document
Generate PDF output file for enhanced presentation
Enable browse functionality for converted PDF verification
Process statement information for improved document formatting

TXT2PDF1.JCL.program_overview: Converts text files to PDF format with browse capability
